mapper.select: select * from store.deal where deal_id=#{dealId} and seller_id =#{sellerId} and buyer_id = #{buyerId}
mapper.insert: insert into store.deal ( stage, goods_id, buyer_id, seller_id, mailing_number, shipping_address_id) values (#{stage},#{goodsId},#{buyerId},#{sellerId}, null,-1) returning deal_id;
